# Hi!

I'm a model visualiser placeholder.

## First some plumbing ðŸš°

Let's load the pensions calculator model:

```{ojs}
location1 = "declann/calculang-miscellaneous-models";
sha = "main";
location2 = "/models/pensions/pensions-calculator"
model = require(`https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/${location1}@${sha}${location2}.js`)
source = fetch(`https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/${location1}@${sha}${location2}.cul.js`).then(response => {
  return response.text();
});

model;
```

Lets get some fun output from it:

```{ojs}
model.projected_fund_value({age_0_in:21,retirement_age_in:65,annual_salary_0_in:20000,empee_contribution_rate_in:0.1,unit_growth_rate_in:0.06, salary_inflation_rate_in:0.02,fund_value_0_in:5000})
```
